title: Decree on data exchange to be issued in Q2 2026
description: A decree regulating the operation of Việt Nam’s data exchange is expected to be issued in the second quarter of 2026, as part of a broader push to strengthen national data governance and accelerate the digital transformation.

# Decree on data exchange to be issued in Q2 2026

January 30, 2026 - 11:05

A decree regulating the operation of Việt Nam’s data exchange is expected to be issued in the second quarter of 2026, as part of a broader push to strengthen national data governance and accelerate the digital transformation.
